docstring: """Provide a way to show and handle a ModelForm in a request."""
name: ModelFormMixin

methods.docstring: """Return the form class to use in this view."""
methods.name: get_form_class

methods.docstring: """Return the keyword arguments for instantiating the form."""
methods.name: get_form_kwargs

methods.docstring: """Return the URL to redirect to after processing a valid form."""
methods.name: get_success_url

methods.docstring: """If the form is valid, save the associated model."""
methods.name: form_valid
